mapper.select: select id, userid, cash_out, bzz, date, utime, node_num from nprox.swarm_user_day where id = #{id}
select id, userid, cash_out, bzz, date, utime, node_num from nprox.swarm_user_day limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select * from swarm_user_day where userid = #{userid} and `date` = #{date}
mapper.insert: insert into nprox.swarm_user_day(userid, cash_out, bzz, date, utime, node_num) values (#{userid}, #{cashOut}, #{bzz}, #{date}, #{utime}, #{nodeNum})

insert into nprox.swarm_user_day(userid, cash_out, bzz, date, utime, node_num) values
(#{entity.userid}, #{entity.cashOut}, #{entity.bzz}, #{entity.date}, #{entity.utime}, #{entity.nodeNum})

insert into nprox.swarm_user_day(userid, cash_out, bzz, date, utime, node_num) values
(#{entity.userid}, #{entity.cashOut}, #{entity.bzz}, #{entity.date}, #{entity.utime}, #{entity.nodeNum})
on duplicate key update userid = values(userid) , cash_out = values(cash_out) , bzz = values(bzz) , date = values(date) , utime = values(utime) , node_num = values(node_num)
mapper.update:
update nprox.swarm_user_day
userid = #{userid},
cash_out = #{cashOut},
bzz = #{bzz},
date = #{date},
utime = #{utime},
node_num = #{nodeNum},
where id = #{id}
UPDATE swarm_user_day set node_num =node_num+#{updatenodes} where userid = #{userid} and `date` = #{date}
